channel.title: Comments on: 3D MATLAB noise – effect of changing Gaussian convolution kernel size
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.title: By: Leonid
item.dc:creator: Leonid
item.description:
Hi, Steven!
Wouldn't the running time here slowed down heavily by calls to the file system, and the hard drive recording, since you save it immediately at each step?
Cheers, Leonid
P.S. Very cool blog, I found it by looking how to generate "blobify" surfaces with sinusoidal transformations over parametric equations.
item.content:encoded:
Hi, Steven!

Wouldn’t the running time here slowed down heavily by calls to the file system, and the hard drive recording, since you save it immediately at each step?

Cheers,
Leonid

P.S. Very cool blog, I found it by looking how to generate “blobify” surfaces with sinusoidal transformations over parametric equations.
